Package edu.ncsu.csc216.hloj.model.manager

Class MenuManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.hloj.model.manager.MenuManager
  • public class MenuManager
extends java.lang.Object
    MenuManager manages the menu of the Howl Lot of Java coffee shop. Menu items can be added, removed, and edited. Class can pass menu information of specific menu items or the full menu.
    Author:
    Ashten Herr, Claire Davis

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addMenuItem​(MenuItem menuItem)
      Adds a menu item to the menu.
      void editMenuItem​(int idx, MenuItem item)
      Edits a menu item at a current index by replacing it with a new item.
      static MenuManager getInstance()
      Get instance manages the singleton of MenuManager.
      MenuItem getMenuItem​(int idx)
      Returns the menu item at a specific index.
      MenuItem[] getMenuItems()
      Returns an array of menu items which represent the full menu.
      void removeAllMenuItems()
      Removes all menu items clearing the menu.
      void removeMenuItem​(int idx)
      Removes menu item at a specific index.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static MenuManager getInstance()
        Get instance manages the singleton of MenuManager. Returns current instance, if null creates a new MenuManager.
        Returns:
        - MenuManager instance

      • addMenuItem

        public void addMenuItem​(MenuItem menuItem)
        Adds a menu item to the menu.
        Parameters:
        menuItem - - menu item being added

      • getMenuItems

        public MenuItem[] getMenuItems()
        Returns an array of menu items which represent the full menu.
        Returns:
        menu as an array of menu items

      • getMenuItem

        public MenuItem getMenuItem​(int idx)
        Returns the menu item at a specific index.
        Parameters:
        idx - - index of menu item
        Returns:
        - menu item at the specified index

      • editMenuItem

        public void editMenuItem​(int idx,
                         MenuItem item)
        Edits a menu item at a current index by replacing it with a new item.
        Parameters:
        idx - - index of menu item being edited
        item - - Edited version of menu item replacing index

      • removeMenuItem

        public void removeMenuItem​(int idx)
                    throws ModelException
        Removes menu item at a specific index.
        Parameters:
        idx - - index of menu item
        Throws:
        ModelException - if the menu item is invalid

      • removeAllMenuItems

        public void removeAllMenuItems()
        Removes all menu items clearing the menu.
